en: Adequate work today, sprout. Remember, efficiency is key. We have quotas to meet.
Don't forget to grab your ration of [wave amp=15 freq=2][color=DARK_VIOLET]Root Reserve[/color][/wave]. You know what the radio says, it's the flavor of Spud's future!
As you gather your things, a small note slips from between your work papers.
It wasn't there this morning. Someone placed it [color=YELLOW]during your shift[/color].
[color=GOLD]Not all is as it seems. The roots of our nation have grown rotten.[/color]
[color=GOLD]Follow the trail, but take care not to be silenced.[/color]
[color=GOLD]Watch who eats the [/color][color=DARK_VIOLET]Reserve[/color][color=GOLD]. Watch who refuses.[/color]
[color=GOLD]- [/color][color=CHARTREUSE]A friend[/color]
"Keep the note hidden - investigate quietly"
"Destroy the note - this could be a test"
"Show the note to Russet immediately"
You fold the note carefully and slip it into your pocket. [color=CHARTREUSE]Someone is reaching out.[/color]
But who? And why you, on your very first day?
You tear the note into tiny pieces
column3: heart pounding. [color=STEEL_BLUE]This could be a loyalty test.[/color]

en: Russet said sprouts who ask questions get "reassigned." Better not to take chances.
You catch Russet before he leaves. "Sir? I found this in my papers..."
Russet snatches the note, reads it. His expression flickers - [color=YELLOW]was that recognition?[/color]
Propaganda. Rebels trying to corrupt new officers. [color=DARK_ORANGE]You did right bringing this to me.[/color]
He pockets the note. Forget you ever saw it. And watch for anyone acting... [color=CRIMSON]suspicious[/color].
That note... and the way Russet answered my question about [pulse freq=3][color=CRIMSON]rejected potatoes[/color][/pulse]...
"[color=VIOLET]Processed. According to protocol.[/color]" What does that even mean?
That note... it said the roots have grown [color=CRIMSON]rotten[/color].
But Spud is glorious, isn't it? That's what they told us. What I believed.
You pull out the note, reading it again. "[color=GOLD]Watch who eats the Reserve. Watch who refuses.[/color]"
Tomorrow, you'll pay attention. [color=YELLOW]Someone is trying to tell you something.[/color]
Russet's face when he read the note. For just a moment, he looked almost... [color=STEEL_BLUE]afraid[/color].
What is [color=DARK_VIOLET]Root Reserve[/color] really? And why would someone warn you about it?
The note is gone, but the words linger. [color=YELLOW]Not all is as it seems.[/color]
Maybe destroying it was the smart choice. Maybe you just silenced your only ally.
I should stay [color=YELLOW]alert[/color]. There's more going on here than stamping passports.
